<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a cargo container of a unit's vest.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''vestContainer''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - a soldier

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]] - cargo container or <NULL-object>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] [[vestContainer]] [[player]]; //2df7d600# 163942: dummyweapon.p3d
</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] [[getMagazineCargo]] [[vestContainer]] [[player]];</code>

<ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>[
	[
		"30Rnd_65x39_caseless_mag",
		"16Rnd_9x21_Mag",
		"HandGrenade",
		"APERSMine_Range_Mag",
		"SmokeShell",

	],[
		2,

		3,
		1,
		1,
		2
	]
]</inner><close></pre></close></ext>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[uniformContainer]], [[backpackContainer]], [[everyContainer]]
</value></part></template>
